Description:
Detects an a non-browser process interacting with the Telegram API which could indicate use of a covert C2

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Non-Browser Network Communication With Telegram API
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (dst_host like '%api.telegram.org%' and  not (process_path like '%\opera.exe' or process_path like '%\safari.exe' or process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\internet explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\internet explorer\iexplore.exe') or process_path like '%\maxthon.exe' or (process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgewebview\application\%' and process_path like '%\windowsapps\microsoftedge.exe' and (process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files\microsoft\edge\application\msedge.exe')) or (process_path = 'c:\program files\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\mozilla firefox\firefox.exe') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edgecore\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\microsoft\edgecore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe' or process_path like '%\whale.exe' or process_path like '%\brave.exe' or (process_path = 'c:\program files\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\google\chrome\application\chrome.exe')))
